root.name: Cougar Force
root.description: The game in split into three different sections.Section 1: Section one is in side scrolling beat-em up style. You escape from jail and beat up the guards using martial arts.Section 2: In section two you fly through enemy territory and destroy enemy planes in Flight Sim style.Section 3: The last section is a motorcycle race. You have to reach the end before your three minutes are up otherwise you explode.
